people.name: Fyodor Yurchikhin
people.title: Flight Engineer
people.bio: Fyordor is a Russian cosmonaut of Greek descent, engineer and test-pilot. This is his sixth trip to space. Fyordor loves collecting stamps, especially space logos.

people.name: Jack Fischer
people.title: Flight Engineer
people.bio: This is Colorado native Jack Fischer??™s first trip to space. Fischer was selected in June 2009 as a member of the NASA Astronaut Group 20 and qualified as an astronaut in 2011.

people.name: Peggy Whitson
people.title: commander
people.bio: Peggy is the definition of a rock-solid veteran and is the intended commander of Expedition 51. She has spent more than a year of her life in space and holds the record for most time in space of any woman in history.

people.name: Oleg Novitskiy
people.title: Flight Engineer
people.bio: Oleg is returning to the ISS for his second mission. He is married with one kid and is a Lieutenant-Colonel in the Russian Air Force.

people.name: Thomas Pesquet
people.title: Flight Engineer
people.bio: This will be Thomas???‚¬?„? first time in space, but he brings a lot of skills to the ISS. He is a black belt in judo, holds licenses for scuba diving and parachuting, he plays the saxophone, and speaks French, English, Spanish, German, and Russian. He is the youngest member of the European Astronaut Corps.
